name: Dodge Mania (Molinakeeper17)
description:
Dodge Mania is Here! [20+ Hours of Work]

-INSTRUCTIONS-

- Dodge Knifes, Spikes, and even Explosive Barrels and Nukes that will make you lose! The game gets really hard progressively, so expect some difficulty. You can buy Skins which will have a price in coins, and also change the Map in the menu.

Controls:

For Computer/Laptop:

- W,A,S,D

For Mobile/Phone:

- Use your Finger

@Molinakeeper17 2023
